title: Problem installing: pygments._mata_builtins
body:
Hi. I'm using Anaconda in Windows 10. I installed the package using `pip install stata_kernel` which went fine. I then tried `python -m stata_kernel.install` and get the following error:

    Traceback (most recent call last):
      File "C:\ProgramData\Anaconda3\lib\runpy.py", line 183, in _run_module_as_main
        mod_name, mod_spec, code = _get_module_details(mod_name, _Error)
      File "C:\ProgramData\Anaconda3\lib\runpy.py", line 109, in _get_module_details
        __import__(pkg_name)
      File "C:\ProgramData\Anaconda3\lib\site-packages\stata_kernel\__init__.py", line 5, in <module>
        from .kernel import StataKernel
      File "C:\ProgramData\Anaconda3\lib\site-packages\stata_kernel\kernel.py", line 17, in <module>
        from .completions import CompletionsManager
      File "C:\ProgramData\Anaconda3\lib\site-packages\stata_kernel\completions.py", line 6, in <module>
        from .pygments._mata_builtins import mata_builtins
    ModuleNotFoundError: No module named 'stata_kernel.pygments._mata_builtins'

I'm not sure what other info would be useful. Please let me know. Any help would be great. Thanks a lot!

PS. Here's my `pip list`
